sql.trim: a.id AS "id", IFNULL(id.id,'') AS "id.id", IFNULL(id.master_data_type_id,'') AS "id.masterDataTypeId", IFNULL(id.filed_code,'') AS "id.filedCode", IFNULL(id.filed_name,'') AS "id.filedName", IFNULL(id.filed_type,'') AS "id.filedType", IFNULL(id.filed_size,'') AS "id.filedSize", IFNULL(id.filed_precision,'') AS "id.filedPrecision", IFNULL(id.required,'') AS "id.required", IFNULL(id.remarks,'') AS "id.remarks", IFNULL(id.create_by,'') AS "id.createBy", IFNULL(id.create_date,'') AS "id.createDate", IFNULL(id.update_by,'') AS "id.updateBy", IFNULL(id.del_flag,'') AS "id.delFlag", IFNULL(id.update_date,'') AS "id.updateDate", a.code AS "code", a.name AS "name", a.is_system AS "isSystem", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag",

a.id AS "id", a.code AS "code", a.name AS "name", a.is_system AS "isSystem", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag",

mapper.sql: LEFT JOIN standard_field id ON id.master_data_type_id = a.id
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM master_data_type a
1=1 AND a.id > 0 AND a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
